name: SheepDog (Roflomo)
description:
Your sheep has gone wild! As a sheepdog, it's your duty to get things under control!

A spiritual successor to https://waterpouch.itch.io/baaah

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Small prototype project, consisting of a single boss fight.

This is a learning project for me to practice developing combat systems, boss fights, and finite state machines.

The dog's shadow was an experimental mechanic, that didn't turn out as interesting as I had hoped.

Thanks for  playing!
